snippet: Heavy favorites to win the American League Central easily, the Tigers have spent only three days alone in first place since April 22.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that although the Detroit Tigers are heavy favorites to win the American League Central, they have spent only three days alone in first place since April 22.
lead_paragraph: Heavy favorites to win the American League Central easily, the Tigers have spent only three days alone in first place since April 22.

headline.seo: Inconsistent Tigers Hoping to Repeat Last Year’s Strong Finish
headline.main: Inconsistent Tigers Hoping to Repeat Last Year’s Strong Finish
headline.print_headline: Inconsistent Tigers Hoping to Repeat Last Year’s Strong Finish
